ai-tha-ap265:1.3_0: I have given half a half-wall.
ai-tha-ap265:2.1_0: On the two occasions when the other goes forth
ai-tha-ap265:2.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap265:2.4_0: this (true) fruit is recommended by the Awakening One,
ai-tha-ap265:3.1_0: twenty eons after the left of the world.
ai-tha-ap265:5.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Ānanda.
